about_p1: I'm a self-taught developer with over 1 year of hands-on experience.
about_p2: My interest in solving problems and optimizing processes drives me to constantly learn new technologies and skills.
about_p3: I see myself as a persistent and detail-oriented person, with the ability to adapt to different environments and challenges. I enjoy collaborating in teams to find efficient solutions to any obstacle.
projects_p: Personal projects where I apply my knowledge and skills as a developer to solve real-world problems, automate tasks, and create useful experiences.
bike_price_p: Web app to check the price history of bicycles, designed to help users identify the best time to buy.
bike_price_li3: Email notifications when the price drops
bikechain_p: Web app that allows you to log cycling workouts on the Ethereum blockchain, generating NFTs as a reward for your achievements.
